snippet: Boston College Students for Sexual Health, an unofficial campus group, was told by university officials to stop distributing condoms, leading organizers to ask: Why now?
abstract: Boston College Students for Sexual Health, unofficial campus group at Boston College, are told by school officials to stop distributing free condoms, prompting organizers to ask why, given that they have been distributing condoms without incident for years.
lead_paragraph: Boston College Students for Sexual Health, an unofficial campus group, was told by university officials to stop distributing condoms, leading organizers to ask: Why now?

headline.seo: Ban on Free Condoms Jeopardizes Group at Boston College
headline.main: Ban on Free Condoms Jeopardizes Group’s Work With Catholic College
headline.print_headline: Ban on Free Condoms Jeopardizes Student Group’s Work With Catholic College
